snippet.title: Digital Exorcist Case File 1: DEFRAG - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Digital Exorcist Case File 1: DEFRAG is an anime interactive fiction visual novel developed by Cool Beans Productions. After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence. Digital Exorcist Case File 1: DEFRAG is coming soon to PC (Steam).
